column4: How do I download & install ALL EDUCATIONAL SOFTWARE available through the download manager? regardless of your state, health & happiness.  Thank you.
I keep pointing & clicking but I would rather just type somithng like 'download all educational software'
Are you referring to Edubuntu packages?
there's 4x meta packages you can just download / install them, if that's what your after: http://edubuntu.org/download
